alert.note: Alert for Steele; Waseca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 12:28AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Steele and Waseca Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1228 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Waldorf, or 19 miles southeast of Mankato, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... New Richland around 1245 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ellendale. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 26 and 36. U.S. Highway 14 between mile markers 157 and 159. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for south central Minnesota.
